titles.title: To support the implementation of the National Defense Strategy for the United States, and for other purposes.
National Defense Strategy Implementation Act
National Defense Strategy Implementation Act
National Defense Strategy Implementation Act

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
